channel.title: Another class idea... locksmith
channel.description:
The locksmith Neutral offensive, unique
Passive 1:Focused, cannot be occupied or redirected at night
Passive 2:saddened, become a drunk without RB if prince died,this won’t happen if you’ve won
Day ability 1:Super lock,uses 4 keys to automatically let someone escape, (1 use)
Night ability 1:Crafter, optain 2 keys, a key can be used in jail to leave,it appears where abilities are and allows you to leave instantly, gaining you abilities and making prince unable to exe you
Night ability 2:Scatter, give keys out randomly in this order, evil,BD,NK,Neutral, you cannot give yourself a key with this. Gives key to anybody:who is not killed the night,who is not reaped.
Victory condition:live to see two people escape.
I made this because my other idea had a comment saying prince was to strong. I think this would be good if trapper was added. Or maybe just good on it’s own
